content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. Now, let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like an excellent location, Mr. Schmidt! I'm sure there's a lot of demand for such a central apartment. I'm looking to rent a place that not only meets my needs but also fits within my budget. Could you tell me what the initial price you have in mind is?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm a businessman. I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's say, I'm looking for 1500 euros per month. That's just a starting point, of course. I'm sure we can find a price that suits both our needs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1500 euros per month is quite steep, Mr. Schmidt. While I appreciate the quality of the apartment and its central location, I'm searching for a more affordable option. Is there any wiggle room in your asking price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm a greedy landlord. I always try to get the highest price possible. However, I can be flexible. Let's say, I can go down to 1400 euros per month. That's a good deal for you, right?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1400 euros is still higher than what I'm willing to pay, Mr. Schmidt. I understand that you're looking to maximize your profit, but I'm also trying to find a place that I can call home without breaking the bank. Is there any chance you could lower the price further?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm a petty man. I won't let you get the better deal easily. However, considering your situation, I can be a bit more generous. Let's say, I can go down to 1300 euros per month. That's a great deal for you, right?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1300 euros is more reasonable, Mr. Schmidt. It's getting closer to what I'm looking to pay. However, I still believe there's room for negotiation. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to 1200 euros per month? That would be more in line with my budget.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm a tough negotiator. I won't let you get the better deal easily. 1200 euros per month is too low for me. However, considering your situation, I can be a bit more generous. Let's say, I can go down to 1250 euros per month. That's a good deal for you, right?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1250 euros per month is getting closer to what I'm comfortable with, Mr. Schmidt. It's a significant improvement from your initial offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to throw in any additional perks or is the price as is?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm a greedy landlord. I always try to get the highest price possible. 1250 euros per month is already a great deal for you. I won't throw in any additional perks. This is the best deal you'll get from me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. While I appreciate your stance, I must also look out for my own financial well-being. I'm willing to pay 1200 euros per month for the apartment, considering its location and condition. I believe this is a fair offer, given our negotiations.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer of 1200 euros per month is too low. I am willing to rent my apartment for 1250 euros per month. That's the best deal you'll get from me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. Since we seem to have reached an impasse, I propose we terminate the negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
